revision.text: Possibly: An account of the principal lazarettos in Europe : with various papers relative to the plague; together with further observations on some foreign prisons and hospitals : and additional remarks on the present state of those in Great Britain and Ireland / by John Howard, F.R.S. 2nd ed.
